alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne; Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 05 at 3:01AM EST until January 07 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches possible. * WHERE...In New York, Madison, Southern Oneida, Cortland, Chenango, Otsego, Broome, Delaware and Sullivan counties. In Pennsylvania, Susquehanna, Northern Wayne, Wyoming, Lackawanna, Luzerne, Pike and Southern Wayne counties. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Still some uncertainty in the exact track of the low pressure center. The Catskill and Pocono mountains have the best chance at seeing higher end amounts.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Lackawanna; Luzerne; Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna; Wyoming
